channel.title: Did you like the changing? server status page instead of forum
channel.description: i posted this because i think no1 liked the changing, in server advertisement topic, all good servers come at the top. now with the server status page.... most of them are all laggy and ppl sell mods and admin. so i would like to propose a change back to normal. LONG LIVE TO ADVERTISENT PAGE!!!! :P
